name: MyTP Freeskiing 3
description:
Incredible freeskiing and skateboarding action sports simulation in one game - that’s MyTP Freeskiing 3 !!

From sweet turns in the Backcountry, Slopestyle competitions, Big air jumps to Streetrail sessions, Bowl runs and crazy Halfpipe action - MyTP Freeskiing 3 has it all.
The game features unique levels with several spots to unlock, different daylight moods and a simple but beautiful menu which lets you access and load everything extremely quick & fast.

The enhanced steering technology gives you the possibility to tweak and style your tricks and combine them to sheer endless variations!

Learn the basics of the game easily with the in-game tutorial and show the world your skills with the instant replay option which lets you share your runs immediately.

And as if all this is not enough, there are several spots which you can skate in summer and ride with your skis in the winter season…

Welcome to the World of MyTP !!


FULL PACKAGE FEATURES
- freeskiing and skateboarding
- 6 unique levels with a total of 43 spots
- 3 daylight mood variants for each level
- several summer and winter season spots
- 86 score and best-trick challenges
- 3 unique characters
- training mode
- tilt- or virtual joystick navigation
- MFI Controller support
- replay option with video & picture export
- 3D Touch
- iCloud synchronization
- Game Center leaderboard
- english language


3D TOUCH
If you grab your skis, you can press more deeply / harder to tweak and style your tricks.


MFI CONTROLLER
Please visit www.rndrln-games.com/MyTP3/MFI/ to get more informations about the input mapping.


VISIT US – randerline.com
FOLLOW US – twitter.com/randerline
LIKE US – facebook.com/randerline
WATCH US – youtube.com/randerline


COMPATIBLE DEVICES
MyTP Freeskiing 3 is compatible with 6th generation iPod touch, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4 and iPad Pro.


OPTIMIZED
MyTP Freeskiing 3 graphics are optimized for 6th generation iPod touch, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4 and iPad Pro.


IN APP - FULL PACKAGE
The game offers a „Full Package“ via In-App purchase which allows to access and unlock(while playing!) all spots in the game. The package is available as a In-App purchase within the game and only need to be purchased once.


MyTP 3 VERSION EXPLANATION
This MyTP Freeskiing 3 version is based on the available "premium" version MyTP 3 - Snowboard, Freeski and Skateboard which additionally is featuring snowboarding action.


IMPORTANT NOTICE
If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)randerline.com. You may also contact us by visiting our website randerline.com. We will read and account for all reviews here, but we can only answer and help you via email. Thank you.
